ygData.subject: Re: Valid Source
ygData.msgSnippet: Well I have a Erudin necro, Gnome necro, DE necro, and human Necro (Heh notice a trend).  And out of all the Gnome has gone up faster and seems more powerful.
ygData.messageBody:
Well I have a Erudin necro, Gnome necro, DE necro, and human Necro (Heh
notice a trend). And out of all the Gnome has gone up faster and seems
more powerful.

<-- Enigma -->
http://members.door.net/enigma



-----Original Message-----
From: Michael Wooldirdge [SMTP:mike@...]
Sent: Wednesday, June 09, 1999 10:21 AM
To: EQ_Necromancer@onelist.com
Subject: Re: [EQ_Necromancer] Valid Source

<< File: ATT00003.htm >> Yes the source was a GM and it is valid. It's
also very well known that certain Race/Class combos get exp bonuses or
disadvantages. For instance a Dwarven Paladin is one of the slowest
leveling characters in the game.

Naeeldar Dark Elf Necromancer of the 21st Circle
Dokine Dwarven Cleric of the 5th Circle
